name: sselpwd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(c0, cpw(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c1))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))

comment: Elementhood to a power set. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 18-May-2020.)
